title: Runaway
description: To the first boy I ever loved.I intended to keep my promises to you. I swear. I loved you, Matthew Caldwell. With my whole heart. I think a piece of me will always love you.But it all came crashing down when I realized you didn’t keep your promises to me.I refuse to take any of my days for granted. I learned that the hard way.So I’m sorry. But I can’t keep my promises to someone who didn’t keep theirs.XOXO,-Brooklyn Sanders
author: Ivy Smoak
